attributes.action: refuse to undertake any change in The Act of Settlement, this law has served our country for nearly 300 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this law brought civil and religious liberties for all in this country and to change this could cause the collapse of the CoE and the monarchy

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "refuse to undertake any change in The Act of Settlement, this law has served our country for nearly 300 years."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16553

Prime Minister's Office
